title: One of a Kind!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Riko-chan, thank you for this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I have to thank you as well. The clothes you lent me are really cute and easy to wear.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Really? I’m glad you like it, cause I do too. The skirt you lent me was also cute~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I had thought that skirt would definitely fit you, Kotori-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Umm, actually.... I tried to make a hair accessory to go perfectly with the skirt. I'd like for you to use it, if you can.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Eh!? You handcrafted it, Kotori-chan? Waah, can I try it on?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>....How does it look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It really fits you! I made it based on the way I imagined you in this skirt, but it fits more than I expected~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Thank you, Kotori-chan....! I’ll treasure this forever and ever!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
